metadata.title: CVE-2024-46816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Stop amdgpu_dm initialize when link nums greater thanmax_links[Why]Coverity report OVERRUN warning. There areonly max_links elements within dc->links. linkcount could up to AMDGPU_DM_MAX_DISPLAY_INDEX 31.[How]Make sure link count less than max_links.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
